skins.name: default_texture
skins.description: The classic default skin. Bland, but at least they're nice.

skins.name: blue_skin
skins.description: Blue like the ocean! A bit of a procrastinator.

skins.name: yellow_skin
skins.description: For some reason has no description.

skins.name: red_skin
skins.description: A red skin, born from the depths of hell. So angry, it tried to fight a wall and lost.

skins.name: rainbow_skin
skins.description: A little bit of everything. Was the track and field champion in high school.

skins.name: positive_skin
skins.description: Always positive. Likes playing around with abacuses.

skins.name: green_skin
skins.description: Avid gardener. Stuck to being on the slope for eternity. Depressed.

skins.name: cosmic_skin
skins.description: Made of the fabric of space itself. Has a problem going through security at airports.

skins.name: gold_skin
skins.description: Always shining bright and trying their best to be the center of attention at parties.

skins.name: victim_skin
skins.description: Wanted in several countries because of their color. Was born this way. Poor skin.

skins.name: overcomplicated_skin
skins.description: Always overcomplicating things. It's just a skin, there is no manual...

skins.name: three_dimensional_skin
skins.description: Thinks they're actually three-dimensional. Dropped out of school early.

skins.name: camouflaged_skin
skins.description: Invisible to the naked eye. Visible if you put on some clothes.

skins.name: stone_skin
skins.description: Sits patiently on beaches to see if anyone will try to skip them across the water.

skins.name: not_available_skin
skins.description: Thought their design would look cooler than it did in the end.

skins.name: thick_skin
skins.description: Isn't hurt easily by criticism or insults. Get it? They have thick skin.

skins.name: thin_skin
skins.description: Is hurt easily by criticism or insults. Get it? They have thin skin.

skins.name: warm_skin
skins.description: Thinks gradients are way cooler than they are. Born in a microwave, raised in an oven.

skins.name: cool_skin
skins.description: Coolest skin in town. Gets all the skins. Good friends with Thin Skin.

skins.name: blurry_skin
skins.description: Has slowly gone blurry over time. Thinks it's just a phase. Refuses to go to the doctor.

skins.name: spiral_skin
skins.description: Has a disease who turned them this way. It's terminal. Spending their last days with their family.

skins.name: normal_skin
skins.description: The normal-est of skins. Shame no one understands them. Has emotional ups and downs.

skins.name: black_and_white_skin
skins.description: Had all life sucked out of them after their recording of their world record got corrupted.

skins.name: value_invert_skin
skins.description: Their life turned upside down after seeing what Yellow Skin did. Hasn't talked since.

skins.name: alien_skin
skins.description: Came to destroy everything. Stayed after everyone became friends with them because they look cool.

skins.name: warning_skin
skins.description: Keeps warning everyone about something round. Hates lemon-flavored candy.

skins.name: rhombus_skin
skins.description: Serial killer on the run. If you are missing any skins, it was probably them.

skins.name: cubism_skin
skins.description: Fell into a well trying to drink some water. Now only speaks Khmer.

skins.name: yotei_skin
skins.description: Based on the popular, amazing-looking limited edition controller design.

skins.name: egg_skin
skins.description: Contrary to popular belief, cows do not actually lay eggs. Sorry all cow eggs lovers.

skins.name: apocalypse_skin
skins.description: Went through an apocalypse on a different Slope. Came here to rest. You can still see their scars.

skins.name: trans_skin
skins.description: Fueled by a mysterious energy source titled 'T'. Always has sudden inexplicable urges to eat a pickle in sight.

skins.name: carrot_skin
skins.description: Always eat the skins of carrots, they're highly nutritious! Wait, you're talking about the Slope skin? Yeah, no idea.

skins.name: baker_miller_skin
skins.description: What is this skin, isn't this just a pink skin? ... Oh, I feel so ... calm ...

skins.name: abstract_skin
skins.description: Professional mathematician. Perfectionist, always trying to get all the shapes to line up.

skins.name: squircle_skin
skins.description: Was a star athlete in soccer and Jenga. Failed in both, but it's okay, because they have a lot of heart...

skins.name: vector_skin
skins.description: Also part of the Abstract Collection. Dislikes Abstract Skin because of their circles.

skins.name: tessellation_skin
skins.description: Final part of the Abstract Collection. Thinks they're the best because of their complicated name.

skins.name: pyramid_skin
skins.description: Thinks they look like the top-down view of a pyramid. At best they look like an aztec pyramid.

skins.name: boulder_skin
skins.description: Skin from a collab with the greatest mod of all time, Boulder Slope.

skins.name: circle_skin
skins.description: Dreams of becoming a hula hoop. Gets dizzy easily, but that won't stop it!

skins.name: tuxedo_skin
skins.description: A truly distinguished skin that has been to all the fanciest of parties. Polite until they find a stain on their lapel.

skins.name: really_thick_skin
skins.description: Isn't hurt easily by criticism or insults. Get it? The creator of this mod doesn't have ideas anymore.

skins.name: violet_skin
skins.description: Believe they are part of the Slopian Royal Family and will only respond if you refer to them as 'Your Majesty'.

skins.name: kelp_skin
skins.description: Incredibly flexible. Also believes they are a mermaid. Their singing, however, well, leaves a lot to be desired.

skins.name: mint_skin
skins.description: A very COOL and collected skin. Has a REFRESHING personality. Are you laughing yet?

skins.name: purple_skin
skins.description: Thinks they are very mysterious but whispers so softly you can never hear them.

skins.name: pastel_skin
skins.description: Soft as a cloud and light as a feather. Doesn't actually do anything in-game, it's just a description, you know?

skins.name: scheele's_skin
skins.description: What? This is just an ugly green skin... Oh God... Anyone else feeling strong pain in their stomach?

skins.name: asiimov_skin
skins.description: Minimalist at heart. Believes in the future and invests in crypto. Has fallen for too many crypto scams already...

skins.name: inverted_skin
skins.description: Enemy of the default skin. Trying their best not to fit in.
